comment.author: 24155644@N03
comment._content: In the 1944 bombardment the town hall was heavily damaged. The buildings on the opposite side were all destroyed. The church tower was also hit and collapsed on the houses next to it.

comment.author: 71187579@N06
comment._content: De Burchtstraat in Nijmegen richting Grote Markt, met het stadhuis aan de linkerkant en zicht op de St. Stevenskerk.
